info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 9:55AM MDT until March 18 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 100 PM MDT.
* At 955 AM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located over Hagerman, or 20 miles southeast of Roswell, and was stationary. The coverage area of hazardous blowing dust will continue to increase through late this morning.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Dexter, Hagerman, Lake Arthur and Greenfield.
This includes Highway 285 between Mile Markers 79 and 96. State Road 2 has also been closed at Navajo Road near the Rio Felix due to hazardous blowing dust.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 1:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 1:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 9:55AM MDT until March 18 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 1:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 1:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
